au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.name: BLOCK_L2=20m_centbszlowOFF
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Drive detector to short position driveDet(19280,300) # Drive guide to ga config driveGuide(guideConfig.ga) # Drive entrance aperture to 240 (for blocked beam) driveEntRotAp(240) # Drive beamstops up selBs(1)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(37.75, 100) # Drive attenuator to 270 driveAtt(270)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka2.experiment.mo.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(37.75, 0) driveBsz(235)
